Fact.Value: Kerf alphabet contains approximately 2 thousand letters - all consonants. Daily vocabulary consists of 9 billion words.
Thess fingers have sensitive vibros, which enable them to operate accurately even blinded.
Asek was the first race in Diadem Galaxy to invent hyperlightspeed traveling methods.
Vegetos do not need "comfort" and regenerate in daylight.
Bass can deliberately fix hands joints and therefore are free from tremor.
While pointed weapon is better against armored targets, cutting weapon deals more damage.
Swooping enemies cannot be attacked in melee. One should either use ranged weapon or wait for counter-attack chance
Paralyzed and knocked-out characters are easy target for enemy.
The character can actively resist external influence, which in turn requires using concentration and endurance.
Global active perks influence the character as a whole. Action perks influence a specific action.
Kerf can position their hands with sub-micron accuracy, making them capable of sophisticated repairs without additional tools.
Velox do not loose consciousness at heart stop or other critical traumas.
If character's health goes below zero it's clinical death. Immediate reanimation is required.
In case of changing the current action the character's readiness suffers a penalty.
External damage and other negative influences interfere with character's actions.
The more active perks are added to the action, the more powerful it is. However, it exausts the character quickly.
Characters can hold scientific and applied research during resting to advance the plot and learn new perks.
Characters can teach each other new perks, which quickens learning process and has a positive team-building effect.
Vision is the main but not the only sensory organ. In critical situation smell and hearing will help.
Battle load reduces character's efficiency. Travel load doesn't interfere with combat, but makes the road harder.
Character's personal inventory (equipped and pocketed items) constitute the battle load. They can be quickly used during a battle.
Nasty weather, low temperature, danger - all these factros have negative influence on resting comfort.
Most quests from different game paths do not exclude each other.
Kerf have a robust chitin shell which provides additional protection in combat.
Thess efficiently cope with pain. They also have high poison resistance.
Asek have a bonus to experience gained and to scientific research.
Bass are natural leaders. A strong leader in the party has positive influence on all its members efficiency.
Scientific research initiator determines the prospect of the research. Other participants provide the progress which cannot overcome it.
A strong warrior cannot deal significant damage with a weak weapon. A weak warrior with a powerful weapon is also inefficient.
If something looks too simple, be careful.
"Strength" influences melee damage.
"Endurance" influences character's health, stamina and maximal battle load.
"Dexterity" determines chance to hit the target in melee and to damage its weak points if they are known.
"Agility" allows character to avoid enemy attacks and shots.
"Speed" influences all character's actions to some extent.
"Intelligence" first of all governs understanding of physical and mathematical sciences. It also determines amount of experience gained by the character.
"Awareness" enables character to create complex chemical compounds. It also allows to attack and avoid multiple enemies simultaneously.
"Intuition" determines character's ability to understand complex systems, such as biological objects. It also increases damage resistance.
Metaphysics gives character supernatural understanding and control of the external world. Sometimes to the extent one can meet only in a fairy tale...
Experience gained for eliminating similar opponents reduces with time, but a chance to deal critical damage increases.
"Accuracy" determines accuracy and speed of ranged attacks preformed by the character.
Thess can use x-ray sight. While having lots of advantages, it heavily affects character's health.
You can change settings of a thess life support system in a menu "maintenance".
Velox is the only race in the Galaxy which has a significant advantage in low light conditions.
Diadem Galaxy is home for 6 civilizations. Recently an extinct Padda civilization was discovered.
Vegetos homeworld was destroyed in Galactic War, which forced The Tree of Vegetos to cease hostilities.
Kerf do not have onomatopoeia. Just as Vegetos, their language is partially chemical.
Asek homeworld suffered several global environmental disasters. It was much feared that the planet wouldn't be able to support life anymore.
At level-up the character automatically gains 5 bonus points to his/her characteristics, which are determined by his race and profession. 5 more points can be distributed manually.
While race and gender determine initial value and growth speed of character's stats, profession determines their possible maximum.
The intergalactic flight lasted for almost 700 years with average speed over 5000 times higher than the speed of light. During this time 9 years have passed for the ship's crew.
The recruited characters always correspond to party's average level.
Bass civilization suffered the least in the Galactic War. This determined their leading role in the Commonwealth.
Different perks have different requirements to character's stats. If the character doesn't meet them, action efficiency will be reduced.
Hyperlightspeed tunnel is an area with low-density vacuum which enables physical objects to move many times faster than the speed of light in normal vacuum.
Hyperlightspeed tunnels are created in resonant explosion of stellar nuclei.
Intergalactic flight preparations took over 100 years.
Nearly all usable items in game are consumables. They are created to be used, not to be stacked.
Beating a harder battle is more rewarding than grinding or farming.
